channel.title: CVE Feed for Philips -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Philips -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-26248|2024-08-03T20:19:20.386Z -- philips -- mri%201.5t
item.description: Philips MRI 1.5T and MRI 3T Version 5.x.x assigns an owner who is outside the intended control sphere to a resource.

item.title: CVE-2021-27501|2024-08-03T21:26:09.146Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: Philips Vue PACS versions 12.2.x.x and prior does not follow certain coding rules for development, which can lead to resultant weaknesses or increase the severity of the associated vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2021-27497|2024-08-03T21:26:08.940Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: Philips Vue PACS versions 12.2.x.x and prior does not use or incorrectly uses a protection mechanism that provides sufficient defense against directed attacks against the product.

item.title: CVE-2021-27493|2024-08-03T21:26:09.120Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: Philips Vue PACS versions 12.2.x.x and prior does not ensure or incorrectly ensures structured messages or data are well formed and that certain security properties are met before being read from an upstream component or sent to a downstream component.

item.title: CVE-2021-26262|2024-08-03T20:19:20.290Z -- philips -- mri%201.5t
item.description: Philips MRI 1.5T and MRI 3T Version 5.x.x does not restrict or incorrectly restricts access to a resource from an unauthorized actor.

item.title: CVE-2021-23173|2024-08-03T19:05:55.570Z -- philips -- engage%20software
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to an improper access control, which may allow an authenticated user to gain unauthorized access to sensitive data.

item.title: CVE-2021-27456|2024-08-03T20:48:17.180Z -- philips -- gemini%2016%20slice
item.description: Philips Gemini PET/CT family software stores sensitive information in a removable media device that does not have built-in access control.

item.title: CVE-2023-40159|2024-07-22T21:13:32.462Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: A validated user not explicitly authorized to have access to certain sensitive information could access Philips Vue PACS on the same network to expose that information.

item.title: CVE-2023-40223|2024-07-18T18:41:52.633Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: Philips Vue PACS does not properly assign, modify, track, or check actor privileges, creating an unintended sphere of control for that actor.

item.title: CVE-2023-40539|2024-07-18T16:29:27.586Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: Philips Vue PACS does not require that users have strong passwords, which could make it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts.

item.title: CVE-2023-40704|2024-07-18T16:33:27.444Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: Philips Vue PACS uses default credentials for potentially critical functionality.

item.title: CVE-2023-40159|2024-07-18T16:19:22.569Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: A validated user not explicitly authorized to have access to certain sensitive information could access Philips Vue PACS on the same network to expose that information.

item.title: CVE-2023-40223|2024-07-18T16:23:18.410Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: Philips Vue PACS does not properly assign, modify, track, or check actor privileges, creating an unintended sphere of control for that actor.

item.title: CVE-2023-40704|2024-07-18T17:58:24.997Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: Philips Vue PACS uses default credentials for potentially critical functionality.

item.title: CVE-2023-40539|2024-07-19T15:36:35.293Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: Philips Vue PACS does not require that users have strong passwords, which could make it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts.

item.title: CVE-2023-40704|2024-08-02T18:38:51.075Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: Philips Vue PACS uses default credentials for potentially critical functionality.

item.title: CVE-2023-40539|2024-08-02T18:38:50.543Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: Philips Vue PACS does not require that users have strong passwords, which could make it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts.

item.title: CVE-2023-40223|2024-08-02T18:24:55.817Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: Philips Vue PACS does not properly assign, modify, track, or check actor privileges, creating an unintended sphere of control for that actor.

item.title: CVE-2023-40159|2024-08-02T18:24:55.536Z -- philips -- vue%20pacs
item.description: A validated user not explicitly authorized to have access to certain sensitive information could access Philips Vue PACS on the same network to expose that information.
